content: Based on the chart in http://build.fhir.org/search_filter.html operations "co" and "sw" are not applicable for Token. Is there a reason for this? I'm using the modifer ":text" to be able to search for medications by the product name via MedicationKnowledge.code and I need to be able to perform a search which "contains" or "starts with" specific values. Is there a way to do this?
this hasn't come up before, so there's no way to do this right now
